Key Arguments: The proposed legislation suppresses free speech on social media and elsewhere.
The legislation severely impacts human rights, specifically the right to freedom of opinion and expression as stated in Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
Restricting the expression, discussion, and sharing of ideas hinders human progress and democracy.
Truth cannot be determined if there is only one arbitrary source deciding what constitutes misinformation or disinformation.
